content: In that kind of -- so the continued uncertainty about what the FDA is going to do and how far they are going to enforce obviously impacts the customer specifically on the B2B side, where they're continuing to be hesitant about how far and what they can order because you just don't know if it's going to become illegal and you have to dispose of it the next day, which necessarily impacts how much inventory you're going to keep, how you're going to order.
